description: The twin-turbo inline-six that launched a thousand builds. The Phantom Turbo is an icon — 320 horsepower from the factory, a bulletproof iron block, and the kind of smooth, relentless power delivery that makes you forget you're breaking the law.
lore: Every generation has its hero car. For Nova Pacifica's street racing scene, that car is the Phantom Turbo. The 2JZ — sorry, the 3S-GTE inline-six — is famously overbuilt, capable of handling 800+ horsepower on stock internals. The Phantom isn't just a car. It's a promise.
